panels.description: The query calculates the 90th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS S3 interface over a specified time interval.

panels.description: The query calculates the average queries rate to the SeaweedFS S3 interface over a specified time interval, aggregated by request types and buckets.

panels.description: Shows the 90th percentile latency of requests to SeaweedFS filer instances

panels.description: The query calculates the 95th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS filer over a specified time interval.

panels.description: The query calculates the 99th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS filer over a specified time interval.

panels.description: The query calculates the queries rate to the SeaweedFS filer in requests per second (RPS) over a specified time interval.

panels.description: This query calculates the average call rate of Filer handlers in SeaweedFS over a specified time interval.

panels.description: This query calculates the average request rate (QPS) to the SeaweedFS Filer Store over a specified time interval, aggregated by request type.
